singleItemContent: How often do you wear T-shirts?
Do you like T-shirts with pictures or prints?
Do you think older people who wear T-shirts are fashionable?
Would you buy T-shirts as souvenirs on vacation?
Describe a difficult thing you did and succeeded
And explain how you felt after you succeeded
Should people set goals for themselves?
How can we judge whether young people are successful nowadays?
What kinds of success can students achieve at school?
Should students be proud of their success?
